com.percussion.services
Class PSBaseServiceLocator

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.services.PSBaseServiceLocator
Direct Known Subclasses:
PSAclServiceLocator, PSAssemblyServiceLocator, PSAssemblyWsLocator, PSCmsContentSummariesLocator, PSContentMgrLocator, PSContentWsLocator, PSFilterServiceLocator, PSGuidManagerLocator, PSPublisherServiceLocator, PSRhythmyxInfoLocator, PSRoleMgrLocator, PSSecurityWsLocator, PSSiteManagerLocator, PSSystemWsLocator, PSUiWsLocator
public class PSBaseServiceLocator
extends Object

Create the appropriate spring context for use in locators. By configuring this class appropriately, either a local or server configuration is loaded. In particular, the init(ServletContext) method is called by the initialization servlet and sets up so that the server configuration is loaded. Otherwise, the spring configuration uses the local definition and initializes on first use.

Author:
dougrand

                              String rxRoot)
                       throws PSMissingBeanConfigurationException
Initializes the Spring context with the config files specified. Also sets the hibernate configuration directory and initializes the initial context.

Parameters:
files - the spring context config files
rxRoot - the Rhythmyx root installation directory
Throws:
PSMissingBeanConfigurationException

isInitialized

public static boolean isInitialized()
Checks to see if the base locator has been initialized

Returns:
true if initialized

addAsParentCtx

public static void addAsParentCtx(org.springframework.context.ConfigurableApplicationContext ctx)
Sets the main application managed by this locator as a parent to the supplied context. This method should be called after this locator's context has been initialized, after the child context is constructed, but before the child context is refreshed. The caller is responsible for closing the supplied child context as necessary.

Parameters:
ctx - The context to set the parent on, may not be null.
Throws:
IllegalStateException - if isInitialized() returns false.

destroy

public static void destroy()
Destroy the configuration for the server context as well as any parent context. This should be called as part of server shutdown.

getBean

public static Object getBean(String beanName)
                      throws PSMissingBeanConfigurationException
Lookup the given bean and return the bean from the spring configuration.

Parameters:
beanName - the bean's name, must never be null or empty
Returns:
the bean, never null
Throws:
PSMissingBeanConfigurationException - if the bean is unknown to spring

getCtx

protected static org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext getCtx()
                                                                throws PSMissingBeanConfigurationException
Retrieve and initialize (if necessary) the Spring configuration object.

Returns:
the configuration object, never null
Throws:
PSMissingBeanConfigurationException
